verses.verse: Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> My father <S%H1><s%> and my brothers, <S%H251><s%> and their flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and their herds, <S%H1241><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that they have, are come <S%H935><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> they are in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>
And he took <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H7097><s%> of his brothers, <S%H251><s%> even five <S%H2568><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> and presented <S%H3322><s%> them to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is your occupation? <S%H4639><s%> And they said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> Your servants <S%H5650><s%> are shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> <S%H6629><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> we, and also <S%H1571><s%> our fathers. <S%H1><s%>

They said <S%H559><s%> morever to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> For to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> are we come; <S%H935><s%> for your servants <S%H5650><s%> have no <S%H369><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%> for their flocks; <S%H6629><s%> for the famine <S%H7458><s%> is sore <S%H3515><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan: <S%H3667><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, we pray <S%H4994><s%> you, let your servants <S%H5650><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Your father <S%H1><s%> and your brothers <S%H251><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> to you:

The land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> you; in the best <S%H4315><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> make your father <S%H1><s%> and brothers <S%H251><s%> to dwell; <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%> let them dwell: <S%H3427><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> any men <S%H582><s%> of activity <S%H2428><s%> among them, then make <S%H7760><s%> them rulers <S%H8269><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> my cattle. <S%H4735><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> in Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> How <S%H4100><s%> old <S%H3113><s%> are you?

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> The days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of my pilgrimage <S%H4033><s%> are an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> few <S%H4592><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%> have the days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%> been, <S%H1961><s%> and have not attained <S%H5381><s%> to the days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of my fathers <S%H1><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of their pilgrimage. <S%H4033><s%>
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> out from before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> placed <S%H3427><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them a possession <S%H272><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in the best <S%H4315><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Rameses, <S%H7486><s%> as Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> nourished <S%H3557><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> household, <S%H1004><s%> with bread, <S%H3899><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to their families. <S%H2945><s%>

And there was no <S%H369><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> for the famine <S%H7458><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> sore, <S%H3515><s%> so that the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and all the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> fainted <S%H3856><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the famine. <S%H7458><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gathered <S%H3950><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> that was found <S%H4672><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> for the corn <S%H7668><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they bought: <S%H7666><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> into Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

And when money <S%H3701><s%> failed <S%H8552><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Give <S%H3051><s%> us bread: <S%H3899><s%> for why <S%H4100><s%> should we die <S%H4191><s%> in your presence? <S%H5048><s%> for the money <S%H3701><s%> fails. <S%H656><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Give <S%H3051><s%> your cattle; <S%H4735><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you for your cattle, <S%H4735><s%> if <S%H518><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> fail. <S%H656><s%>

And they brought <S%H935><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%> to Joseph: <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them bread <S%H3899><s%> in exchange for horses, <S%H5483><s%> and for the flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and for the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of the herds, <S%H1241><s%> and for the asses: <S%H2543><s%> and he fed <S%H5095><s%> them with bread <S%H3899><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%> for that year. <S%H8141><s%>

When that year <S%H8141><s%> was ended, <S%H8552><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to him the second <S%H8145><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, We will not hide <S%H3582><s%> it from my lord, <S%H113><s%> how that our money <S%H3701><s%> is spent; <S%H8552><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> also has <S%H413><s%> our herds <S%H4735><s%> of cattle; <S%H929><s%> there is not ought left <S%H7604><s%> in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of my lord, <S%H113><s%> but our bodies, <S%H1472><s%> and our lands: <S%H127><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> shall we die <S%H4191><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> we and our land? <S%H127><s%> buy <S%H7069><s%> us and our land <S%H127><s%> for bread, <S%H3899><s%> and we and our land <S%H127><s%> will be servants <S%H5650><s%> to Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> us seed, <S%H2233><s%> that we may live, <S%H2421><s%> and not die, <S%H4191><s%> that the land <S%H127><s%> be not desolate. <S%H3456><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> for the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his field, <S%H7704><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the famine <S%H7458><s%> prevailed <S%H2388><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them: so the land <S%H776><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> Pharaoh's. <S%H6547><s%>

And as for the people, <S%H5971><s%> he removed <S%H5674><s%> them to cities <S%H5892><s%> from one end <S%H7097><s%> of the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> even to the other end <S%H7097><s%> thereof.

Only <S%H7535><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> he not; for the priests <S%H3548><s%> had a portion <S%H2706><s%> assigned them of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and did eat <S%H398><s%> their portion <S%H2706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them: why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they sold <S%H4376><s%> not their lands. <S%H127><s%>

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have bought <S%H7069><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> and your land <S%H127><s%> for Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> see, <S%H1887><s%> here is seed <S%H2233><s%> for you, and you shall sow <S%H2232><s%> the land. <S%H127><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the increase, <S%H8393><s%> that you shall give <S%H5414><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> parts <S%H3027><s%> shall be your own, for seed <S%H2233><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and for your food, <S%H400><s%> and for them of your households, <S%H1004><s%> and for food <S%H398><s%> for your little <S%H2945><s%> ones.

And they said, <S%H559><s%> You have saved our lives: <S%H2421><s%> let us find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord, <S%H113><s%> and we will be Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> servants. <S%H5650><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> it a law <S%H2706><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> should have the fifth <S%H2569><s%> part, except <S%H7535><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> only, <S%H905><s%> which became <S%H1961><s%> not Pharaoh's. <S%H6547><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in the country <S%H776><s%> of Goshen; <S%H1657><s%> and they had possessions <S%H270><s%> therein, and grew, <S%H6509><s%> and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> exceedingly. <S%H3966><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> seventeen <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> so the whole age <S%H3117><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was an hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And the time <S%H3117><s%> drew near <S%H7126><s%> that Israel <S%H3478><s%> must die: <S%H4191><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, If <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> put, <S%H7760><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, your hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> my thigh, <S%H3409><s%> and deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly <S%H571><s%> with me; bury <S%H6912><s%> me not, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

But I will lie <S%H7901><s%> with my fathers, <S%H1><s%> and you shall carry <S%H5375><s%> me out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and bury <S%H6912><s%> me in their burial plot. <S%H6913><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> as you have said. <S%H1697><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> Swear <S%H7650><s%> to me. And he swore <S%H7650><s%> to him. And Israel <S%H3478><s%> bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself on the bed's <S%H4296><s%> head. <S%H7218><s%>
